about_the_game:
PREMISE

Blood Vessel is a horror action FPS set in an apartment building overrun with a nest of Vampires. You’ll play as the Landlord, the owner of the building, who has returned to collect his rent.

Arm yourself with the belongings of your DEADbeat tenants and shoot, kick, and bash your way through all 5 levels.

FEATURES


  • Melee and ranged weapons. Keep your shirt clean or dye it red, the choice is yours.
  • Realized Magic System
  • Gore system with limb dismemberment
  • Immersive storytelling. BV is styled with the art of early 2000s Source Engine games with both low res hand painted textures and photographs. It uses baked light over dynamic and puts an emphasis on visual clarity.

_   _   _    __  ____  _        _               __    ____   ____       /
|     |     |      |     |___    | ___ |    |             |      |___         |           / 
|__|__|   _|_   ___|    |         |    |___    _|_    ___|         |         .

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depictions of violence against NPC and player characters. This includes being shoot by various guns, being cut, crushed, pushed by various various melee weapons and thrown objects such as axes and grenades.

detailed_description:
PREMISE

Blood Vessel is a horror action FPS set in an apartment building overrun with a nest of Vampires. You’ll play as the Landlord, the owner of the building, who has returned to collect his rent.

Arm yourself with the belongings of your DEADbeat tenants and shoot, kick, and bash your way through all 5 levels.

FEATURES


  • Melee and ranged weapons. Keep your shirt clean or dye it red, the choice is yours.
  • Realized Magic System
  • Gore system with limb dismemberment
  • Immersive storytelling. BV is styled with the art of early 2000s Source Engine games with both low res hand painted textures and photographs. It uses baked light over dynamic and puts an emphasis on visual clarity.

_   _   _    __  ____  _        _               __    ____   ____       /

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470

name: BLOOD VESSEL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: should run ok on ur mums laptop
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Horror Action FPS. Landlord reluctantly removes the Vampire infestation from his apartment block.
